name: Janga
description:
FEEL GOOD SANDBOX


Janga is a first person game in which you can express yourself with the help of super powered blowpipes.

With those blowpipes you can actually:

FILL YOUR WORLD WITH PLANTS!


Plants are nice and they make your world lively.

MAKE THEM GROW OR SHRINK!


Are you bonsai or Mana tree?

FLY IN GLIDING BUBBLES!


What a strange Matter!

CREATE EARTH STRUCTURES!


And build whatever you'd like!

SLIDE ON ICY BRIDGES!


Speed up your game flow with some roller coaster!



This game will go on open Early Access next September. We plan to add as much mechanics as we can.

Reasonable list:
  • Many Blowpipes...
  • Many type of plants, who each play an instrument. Your garden will become a real concert!
  • Many type of biomes, with their own atmosphere and musical style.
  • Integration of the gravity control from our previous game Matter, to play on planets with spherical, donuts and crazy shapes!
  • Exploration
  • Emergent gameplay

Unreasonable list that could be fulfilled with much support from the community and publishers:
  • Online Multiplayer: visit your friends world, create and explore together
  • Open Multiplayer: you can visit random player worlds
  • Meet wacky characters that will reveal you some secrets

Made by Concrete Games:


Game Design & Programing by
    @MatoLabu

Visuals, Music & Sound by
    @Tomavatars

2D & 3D Arts by
    Monf
